thread.title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley
thread.title_full: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley - The Morning Call

author: mcall.com
title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley
text:
DAY TRIPPIN'
•"Deck the Halls," Good 'N Plenty, Dec. 9. $85. Coplay Seniors, Clara, 610-433-4063.
•Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Rockvale Outlets, lunch and more, Nov. 7. $88. Chestnut Hill Church, Debbie, 610-967-1975.
•"Joseph," Sight & Sound Theatre, lunch at Shady Maple, Sept. 12. $115; $60, child, New Bethel Church, Margie, 610-298-2451.
•Nemours Mansions and Gardens, dinner, Sept. 12. $75. Emmaus Garden Club, Diane, 610-554-0653.
•Grounds for Sculpture, Hamilton, N.J., Sept. 16. $62. Parkland Garden Club, Millie, 610-398-3400.
•"South Pacific," Allenbury Resort, lunch, July 23. $89. "Inspire," American Music Theatre, lunch at Fulton Steamboat, Aug. 20. $86. Operation Sunshine, 610-435-9155.
•TV and Movie Sites Guided Tour, New York City, Madame Tussauds Wax Museum, Aug. 19. $77. Glenmoor Travel Club, Joe, 610-250-0553.
•Harrisburg, Capital tour, Governor's Mansion, Sept. 8. $25. Mountainville 30 Crime Watch, Janet, 610-791-1816.
•Rockwood Mansion & Gardens, Wilmington, Del., train ride, Sept. 23. $106. Macungie Institute, Karen, 610-966-7830.
•Air Show, Atlantic City, Sept. 2. $55. "Social Security," Hunterdon Hills Playhouse, Sept. 22. $73.50. Sears Retirees, 610-434-7750.
c Comments Got something to say? Start the conversation and be the first to comment. Add a comment 0 •Barry Manilow tribute, Mt. Airy, Sept. 14. $65. Christmas Show, Hunterdon Hills, lunch, Dec. 18. $85. The Morning Call retirees, Phyl, 610-432-9442.
•Yankees vs. Tampa Rays, tailgate party, Sept. 5. $85. Radio City Christmas Spectacular, Dec. 19. $125. Lehigh Valley Yankee Fan Club, Chuck, 484-347-8331.
•"Joseph," Sight & Sound Theatre, Sept. 2. $86. St. Thomas More, Marie, 610-965-9960.
•911 Memorial and Museum, Bryant Park, Sept. 19. $75. Salisbury Township, 610-797-4000.
•Nightscapes, Longwood Gardens, Aug. 21. $60. Washington D.C., Baltimore's Inner Harbor, time on your own, Sept. 9. $55. "Joseph," Sight & Sound Theatre, Oct. 7. The "Platters" Christmas Show, Mt. Airy Casino, Dec. 8. $68. St. Joseph's Women's Guild, Sue, 610-392-2957.
•"South Pacific," Allenberry Dinner Theatre, July 30. $87. Notre Dame of Bethlehem 55+ Club, Joyce, 610-866-0360.
•Octoberfest , Platzl Brauhaus, Oct. 15. $92. Lights & Flowers, tour of Philadelphia, Longwood Gardens, Dec. 1. $89. St. John Fisher and Queenship of Mary churches, Marge, 610-262-3174.
•River Lady Historic Lunch Cruise, Toms River, N.J., July 24. $87; $82, seniors age 65 and older; $72, ages 11 and younger. Grounds for Sculpture, self-guided tour, Aug. 11. $50. Gettysburg Battlefield Tour, Aug. 21. $75.65; $69.40, students. Ferragosta at Little Italy or Botanical Gardens, Sept. 13. $45. Morning Angels, Camille, 908-387-0001.
•Phillies-Marlins, Citizens Bank Park, July 18, $65. Emmanuel United Methodist Church, Jeff, 610-821-5572.
•Germanfest, Ehrhart's, Oct. 15, $70. Gourmet Shopping, New York, Zabar's, Little Italy, Southstreet Seaport, $35. Nov. 21. A Christmas Show, Woodloch Pines, Dec. 10. $65. Whitehall AARP 3115, Kathy, 610-799-2793.
•Lititz Craft Show, Aug. 8. $40. Northern Lehigh Community Center, 610-760-0300.
OVERNIGHT TRIPS
•Chicago, Navy Pier, Skydeck, cruise, museum, and more, Aug. 9-15. $850. Southern Caribbean Cruise, six ports, Jan. 17-29. Starting at $1,419. Lower Macungie Seniors, Doris, 610-966-3653.
•Canada & New England Cruise, Halifax, St. John, Bar Harbor, Newport, Sept. 17-24, 2016. $857-$1,687. Whitehall AARP 3115, Tim, 610-759-6644.
•Orlando, Holy Land Experience, six breakfast, four dinners, more, Oct. 4-10. $526. Union Baptist Senior Group, Elsie, 484-560-5002.
•Wilmington, Vermont, Ben & Jerry's, King Arthur Flour, Rock of Ages Quarry, and more, Oct. 1-4. $595. Sacred Heart Hospital Nursing Office, Donna, 610-776-4652.
•Cape Cod, sightseeing, food, entertainment and more, Oct. 5-9. Sears Retirees, 610-434-7750.
•Tournament of Roses Parade, city tours, San Diego Zoo, Dec. 30-Jan. 4. $2,170. Air Products Retirees, Barb, 610-682-4855.
•Desert Southwest, Nashville, Memphis, Oklahoma City, Sedona, Kansas City, 29 meals, four nights in Grand Canyon Hotel, more, Sept. 17-Oct. 2. Lower Macungie Seniors, Doris, 610-966-3653.
•Canada and New England Cruise, Halifax, Nova Scotia, St. John, Portland, Sept. 26-Oct. 3. $949-$1,499. MORA Club, Roland, 610-703-1788.
•Finger Lakes, N.Y., winery tour, tasting, dinner at Belhurst Castle, lake cruise, Sept. 21-23. $379. Fearless Fire Company Auxiliary, Judy, 610-797-1466.
•Pigeon Forge and Smoky Mountains, 10 meals, shows at Dollywood, Sept. 13-19. $615. Neighborhood Council Group, Ann, 610-797-6870.
Sponsored Trips are for nonprofit organizations. Send information two weeks in advance: event, date, cost, phone number. Fax: 610-820-6693; email: news@mcall.com ; mail: Trips, The Morning Call, Box 1260, Allentown, 18105-1260.
